fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Rig the vote, and anonymously vote someone for as many times as there are living Criminals.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You see all votes that occur before they actually happen. You may choose to cancel a vote, 2 vote cooldown, they will not be allowed to place another vote.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take down the town through various crimes.
